```{r}
library(rmarkdown)
library(yaml)
library(here)

todo <- yaml::read_yaml(here("analysis", "contrast_correlation.yml"))


for (i in seq_along(todo)) {
  opts <- todo[[i]]
  fname <- paste(opts$y_variable, "vs", opts$x_variable)
  fname <- gsub(" ", "_", fname)
  fname <- gsub(":", "-", fname)

  rmarkdown::render(
    input = here("analysis", "contrast_correlation_template.Rmd"),
    output_dir = here("analysis", "output"),
    output_file = fname,
    output_format = "pdf_document",
    params = opts
  )
}
```
